title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

12:15 <sburjan`> has quit  
13:06 <vmassol> maven's up  
13:08 <@cjdelisle> Just noticed, thanks.  
14:01 <lpereira> has joined #xwiki  
14:02 <@cjdelisle> vmassol: Can you go over exactly what you did to repeat the bug with users? I looked at the storage code and AFAICT the change to the cache should not have exposed a bug.  
14:03 <@cjdelisle> also I had no trouble creating an empty group, adding a user, deleting the user and seeing the empty group again.  
14:18 <@cjdelisle> be back in a while, coffee.  
14:38 <vmassol> cjdelisle: ok here it goes  
14:38 <vmassol> 1) create a new subwiki on myxwiki.org (for ex)  
14:38 <vmassol> 2) register a new user in your newly created wiki  
14:38 <vmassol> 3) go in admin, users screen and remove the Admin user  
14:39 <vmassol> 4) go in the admin, groups screen and notice the admin group is not there anymore  
14:39 <vmassol> (I think that's what I did)  
15:14 <@cjdelisle> Thanks. I don't think the problem is in XHS, I'll have to consult sdumitriu on what he saw.  
16:13 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki
